name: KUBIK
description:
THIS GAME IS IN THE VERY EARLY STAGES OF DEVELOPMENT AND NEW BUILDS WILL BE UPLOADED WEEKLY, SOMETIMES EVEN DAILY.

KUBIK is about the journey of a lost cauldron and his struggle to survive as a 2D cauldron in 3D space.

Conquer the cube dungeons and collect power-ups to help him get back home.

Collect the four cubes and reach the top to finish a level.

CONTROLS

Arrow keys to move

Space to jump

Hold space to boost

Z for hammer attack

Q for bomb

'M' to mute

'L' to load new level

Up arrow in front of exit to go through

Last build uploaded: December 15th, 10:25 pm

Latest changes:

- Fixed bug with crawler enemies

- Added bomb pickups, you no longer have infinite bombs
